website_summaries.verdict: With a slightly thicker texture, the sand in this set is amazing for holding small details. But this also makes it harder for smaller hands to use, so it's not the best pick for the youngest children.
pros: Includes inflatable sandbox, air pump, large and small castle molds, vehicle molds, tools, two lbs
Made of 98% sand and 2% gluten-free food-grade cross-linking agent
cons: Sand is not as pliable as other brands, so it may be harder for younger children to roll out for playing

customer_reviews.title: Great Activity
customer_reviews.text: my grandson loved this and played for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Fleurie

customer_reviews.title: Clean hands and fun
customer_reviews.text: This to me is a mix between clay and sand. My husband touched it expected his hands to feel dirty. It leaves no feeling on your hands, no does it feel gritty. It took shape easily while just squeezing it in my hand. The molds are easy to use, just keep packing the sand in really tight, then gently tap on the mold to release. I will suggest that if this is for more than 1 child, that more sand is probably preferable. It was fun for the children as much as the adults. The sand is easy to clean up if it breaks off from the rest. Comes with a bag to store the sand in.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Best Kinetic Sand on Amazon and Easy Clean Up! Love IT!
customer_reviews.text: As a former preschool teacher I have a lot of experience with kinetic sand. This SPACE SAND is so much better. It really holds the small details of the molds and the kids I work with love it! Great toy for getting children to play together. The mini-pool that holds the sand kept it nice and contained, but even when it gets on the floor, it is super easy to clean up. I will definitely be buying more Space Sand in the future and recommend it to anyone who works with kids or has children/grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Holds 2 year old’s attention for a straight hour!
customer_reviews.text: Great second birthday present! My daughter actually played with it for 45 minutes straight and told her grandfather “I’m busy” when he tried to get her attention 😂 The inflatable “sand box” fits PERFECTLY on the IKEA kids table which really helps keep it contained so we can use it indoors. Nothing holds her attention like this and it’s even fun for adults to join in 😊 Highly recommend. Also, if your sand dries out (it happens to all kinetic sand from use and being in the air) just put it in a bowl and add tiny bits of water until you get it back to the right consistency.
customer_reviews.author: BOSTONBROOKYLN

customer_reviews.title: The blow up tray and tools are a fun addition and influenced our choice
customer_reviews.text: The blow up tray and tools are a fun addition and influenced our choice. However, the sand - main reason for purchasing - is dry and hard. We are able to mold it but is isn't much fun to cut and play with since we were expecting it to be pliable. It is okay but I suspect that we will end up ordering a better quality sand therefore essentially wasting our money on this kit. Of course, the tools are re-usable so we received some value from the purchase (maybe a few dollars worth?).
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this product! It is literally the best play sand EVER! Because it actually stays together when you mold it unlike say kinetic sand, after you mold it, it starts to fall over, so if you actually want to make a castle you can’t. But with this you can. It will stay in place for like 20 min or more! It’s great. Also one big thing that I really wish this company would do is sell separate sand. I HATE having to buy a new kit every time my sons needs sand. Also I would like to fill his sand box with it but can’t with so little. Please think of selling separate sand!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Just AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 4 year old this Christmas and by far it’s been his FAVORITE gift!! Hours of creative non-digital fun! It’s like a combo/best of both worlds of being at the beach & playing with play doh....without sand in your crevices & doesn’t dry out!! The blow up raft/play space & included pump make it so easy to set up & contain. We bought a few extra bags of the kinetic sand in the same color so he had more to play with. I was worried they might not mix well together, but they did beautifully & he’s happy to have more to make bigger sand “forts”! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Al M.

customer_reviews.title: ... little setup at Bass Pro shop and she absolutely loved it. However we opened it today and set ...
customer_reviews.text: My brother purchased this for my daughter for Xmas for her to play with because they had a little setup at Bass Pro shop and she absolutely loved it. However we opened it today and set everything up and dumped the space sand only to be disappointed with it. The sand was hard and really crumbly. I'm not sure what was wrong with it but the consistency of the sand was not right. It sticked onto their clothing and was all over my floor. It was an absolute mess. It wasnt smooth to work with it didn't give us that wow factor we were expecting. I will be asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo cool! Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest toys I think I’ve ever seen! The sand doesn’t stick to you or dry out. It’s really quite amazing. My boys LOVE this! We ended up ordering more sand!! This 2 lb. bag that comes with the kit isn’t enough to really fill the tray they send. There isn’t enough, for instance, to build what is pictured on the box. STILL, it remains one of the best toys I got for my kids for Christmas this year! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hopson

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderfully creative product! My 8 year old son is absolutely over the moon thrilled to have his own private beach right here at home. Definitely his new go-to toy. This comes with such a wide variety of molding pieces that you will never get bored and the description is absolutely accurate...sand stays moist and does not stick to your hands. Endless sandcastle possibilities, easy clean up and SUPER fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sand! I’m 60 y/o and I have arthritis. I don’t like squeeze balls so I bought the sand to help work my hands. It is amazing. It feels great and I bought extra molds to play with. Sometimes the simplest things have the biggest results. And no mess! Now I want to add more sand!!! 🥰🥰
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! We Bought this as a Christmas gift for my 5 year old daughter. We added in another bag of sand. She absolutely loves it. Would highly recommend this to anyone one who has a imagination and the love to play with sand. Comes with a bunch of miniature toys, the sand pops right out out the molds and stays in the shape! Love it! What an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A much better alternative to the standard play dough stuff.
customer_reviews.text: After playing around with this stuff in a local toy store. I bought it as a gift for my granddaughter, aged 5. She also received the other molding material that we all know as flour/salt/water but she LOVES this stuff. It's much more expensive but lasts forever if you follow the guidelines for keeping it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Coastie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product, buy extra sand
customer_reviews.text: This has brought hours of fun for my toddler. Lots of tools to play with and easy clean up and storage for me. Do get extra sand though, there is only a small amount included.
customer_reviews.author: Collette

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our granddaughter last Christmas. She loved it then and she STILL plays with it (cuz her mommy helps her to keep everything together when done playing). Tactile experiences. We built little sand castles, etc and pretended we were at the beach in the middle of nowhere Iowa!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Everything was a little bit smaller than I expected but it actually turned out perfect because now my daughter can play with everything right on the table. The sand really is "magical". I very much enjoy playing with this with my daughter. No mess, no problems. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. My kids 3yrs and 6yrs love playing with their new sand pit. That's what they call it. Very happy with the purchase, the quality and they have so many molds so they never get bored. All I would do now is just get another 2 lb sand by it self and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: shahin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sand!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson and his sister spent hours playing with this sand. Got it for grandson's birthday. It is clean and easy cleanup. Arrived on time. Very pleased.We also ordered an extra bag of sand.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds shapes well
customer_reviews.text: The sand is easy to play with and the shape molds work very well. The inflatable play surface arena helps keep everything neatly within and keeps it easy cleanup to re- package for next time use. Great fun for kids to play in the sand without beach access.
customer_reviews.author: Linn Floral City

customer_reviews.title: We both like the sand
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for granddaughter. We both like the sand. It doesn't make a mess, so I can put it on kitchen table and it cleans up easily. It's a nice alternative to play-do and better than the moon sand she had before.
customer_reviews.author: Diana J. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up - keeps mess to a minimum
customer_reviews.text: The "pool" is easy to blow up and keeps the sand in one spot. Could easily add another 2 lbs of sand to this so bottom was covered. Gives kids lots of room to create what they want and clean up is a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Robinstwin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy
customer_reviews.text: My twin three year olds and 5 year old love this. The sand molds are so fun and we especially love that the sand doesn’t dry out. Plus having the inflatable tray to keep all the sand together is perfect! Definitely worth spending your money on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because of all the great reviews but kids liked the blue colored kinetic sand better. They pushed this one to the side after playing with it for 5 minutes. The price also went down over $7 right after I ordered it😡 so I was going to return and reorder it before opening it but to ship it back is $7 so that's pointless! 😏
customer_reviews.author: Christy D

customer_reviews.title: Cute little kinetic sand kit
customer_reviews.text: There are quite a few sand toys and the blow up beach is cute. There’s sufficient sand but I would have liked a little more. My daughter really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up and I really like the blow up ...
customer_reviews.text: Just had a snow day and my kids aged 6 and 3.5, played with this for a total of about 5 hours. They added some of my sons small trucks to it and some small people from other playsets and it kept them entertained for hours. Easy clean up and I really like the blow up base that the sand sits in. Perfect size kit for my kids. Would love it if a little more sand came with it, but planning to buy some extra.
customer_reviews.author: MawaKelly

customer_reviews.title: Great actvity
customer_reviews.text: Very fun to play with. The kinetic sand is mesmerizing and therapeutic. The pieces and inflatable mat included are perfect additions to complete the kit. Would definitely buy again as a gift to give.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Makes playtime easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice to have for kids to play with their kinetic sand! Holds way more than the two pounds that come with it so there is plenty of room for more sand.
customer_reviews.author: kerri davids

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter LOVES this stuff! She plays with it for hours! Highly recommended product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: V. Solem

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: The sand has a nice consistency and cleans up easily. I like how it stores easily in the container. Only criticism is the inflation tool is useless. It much easier to just blow it up like a balloon.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious tray, grest quality sand.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Ingenious blow up tray to keep it contained. My daughter has made the cutest creations with the sand.
customer_reviews.author: JLynn

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for my 3 year old.
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo is still obsessed with this, even three months later. Be sure to store the sand in the ziploc bag and if it gets dry, just place a damp paper towel in with it and voila—perfect sand again! I’d recommend this sensory set for any kiddo!
customer_reviews.author: NicP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The sand is so cool! Got this for my nephew and he loves it! We could play with it for hours. Cool idea and fun. Also came in the mail very fast and great customer survive there was a letter in the box thanking me for my purchase. Appreciation for customers is rare nowadays and it made me even happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 yr old granddaughter for Christmas and she loved it. She doesn't like to get her hands dirty. This play sand leaves no residue. When I went to Christmas dinner with the family my nephew 13 and niece 17 both had received this sand for Christmas. They went on and on about how much they love how the sand feels, the texture and so many things to create with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product. We bought it for our 7yr daughter for Christmas. She loves it and we (adults) even got to play with it. She really misses the beaches in Hawaii so we brought the beach feeling to her. The shipping took awhile because we had bought it when it was out of stock but it still got here on time for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Lavinia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it!!!! And easy to clean up!! The inflatable tray transforms into a bag where you can carry all the pieces
customer_reviews.author: Little_Yogi_1986

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old has lived playing with this sand. We haven't had any problems with it. We keep it in a bin and use a vinyl tablecloth on the floor while being played with to contain any mess.
customer_reviews.author: JandC

customer_reviews.title: She loved it and played in the sand for many hours
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 3 year old granddaughter. She loved it and played in the sand for many hours. The sand is great and doesn't make a mess. Just as stated in the description, it sticks together but does not stick to anything else. Also, the sandbox with the inflated edges is terrific as it keeps the sand confined to that area. All in all this was a great hit with my granddaughter and was an attention keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love so much i bought 3. My daughter enjoys playing with this set and it comes with everything. It keeps her occupied for hours and she's 3
customer_reviews.author: Butterflykisses8i8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect indoor sand play set
customer_reviews.text: Amazing play set. So much fun to use and easy to store. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: She loved it so much
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to play sand very much. So I bought this set for her birthday gift. She loved it so much. The quality is good and price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Best toy out there for kids of all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 10 of these to give away as gifts to all the kids in my family. This gift was a hit with the kids and with the parents. Will buy again great price great quality. The sand comes packed like a brick but it’s more than enough for all the fun castle mold shapes. This items is great that I even love to play with it with my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy for all to enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: this"sand" is so cool to play with. Easy clean up. Out of the many presents my son received this was a HIT! He stays on fortnite all the time. Not anymore! My 15 yo and 11 yo want this as well.
customer_reviews.author: WandaTheMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for nephew and he absolutely loves it. He played with it all day!

customer_reviews.title: Not like nope "moon sand" this product is really cool and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not like nope "moon sand" this product is really cool and so far has remained usable and has not dried. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: xalos1

customer_reviews.title: ☺️
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids loved the sand and shapes but the try was very small
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lynch Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Would not order again!
customer_reviews.text: The items came with the corners of both packages badly crinkled. Also was a tag on back that said "animal sand." I do not know what that means or if some precautions should be taken. If I wasn't going to depart for Florida, I would have sent the packages back. Think more care should be taken when sending Christmas gifts for kids. M

customer_reviews.title: Helps with the mess
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to contain all the magic sand, a great idea to help keep the mess down

customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product!!!! I wish there was more sand in it than there was but my stepson(who's 7) loved this!

customer_reviews.text: Kids like it. Not much of a novelty after 2 weeks, but ok to play with when the beach is not an option.
customer_reviews.author: DDT

customer_reviews.title: Great gift— the Mat is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The fact that this comes with a mat is amazing. It keeps the sand contained for them to make less of a mess. Such a great gift for a 2-4 yr old
customer_reviews.author: Wilbert J Burkholder

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old grandchild loves it! It keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandchild loves it! It keeps her attention for a long period of time and she has nothing but a big smile on her face the whole time she's playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Bock

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean up!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this!!! A 3- and 4-yo spent a solid hour playing with it, which is almost unheard of :)
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this !
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves this stuff and it’s not terribly messy and it lasts so far. Just need to be able to purchase a refill pack! He plays with it for hours! I just bought another to send to my niece for her birthday !

customer_reviews.title: on time
customer_reviews.text: Delivery on time. Bought as a gift and the child was delighted.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this product and I enjoy playing with it as well
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this product and I enjoy playing with it as well!! Easy to clean up and so much fun!

customer_reviews.title: Great set - everything you need for fun!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun for my 2 YO and 4 YO Grandkids - and me too!

customer_reviews.title: Better than National Geographic sand!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Easy to mold, easy to clean up, no mess on the hands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this sand
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this sand. It's a great alternative to playing with Playdoh, or clay. They can make molds, and play indoors. It has this unique feel and quality when handled.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Garvey

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars because I have to clean it up
customer_reviews.text: Sand was good. No broken castles and the blow up tub does a good job containing the inevitable mess.

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait for the grandkids to get this! Came just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Vanderford

customer_reviews.title: Even tho it's "sand" , there is a very easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this product. Easy clean up after. Kids loved the texture and the ease in building "sand" castles , etc. I put the product in a cookie sheet instead of the container provided. Easier to deal with when play time was over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my grandkids. They love playing with the sand and using the molds to make sand sculptures. I chose to put it in a plastic storage box with a lid instead of using the blow up sand container.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I'm giving this five stars for now!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Awesome! No complaints. I'm giving this five stars for now because I haven't opened it (it's a birthday present), but as soon as it's opened I'll update this review accordingly.

customer_reviews.title: Great contained 'sand box'

customer_reviews.title: good but sand dries out
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his sand. The only issue I have is that even folding over the case, the sand dries out. I had to put it in a large resealable bag to keep sand soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of wild things

customer_reviews.title: Better than Walmart sand!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the quality of this sand but once we received it, I was very happy to find out that it’s excellent quality sand. We’ve had it out a million times and my child loves it and still hasn’t dried out. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Satilla

customer_reviews.title: Mess Free!
customer_reviews.text: My children received this item for Christmas and they absolutely loved it! It is mess free and it is entirely inexpensive. We plan on buying more sand for it in the future.

Came with a large amount of sand for everyone to easily share. Really happy I bought it for my boys.

customer_reviews.text: Update: I am tempted to removing one star, the Kinetic sand is not clean at all, there're lot of hairs found in it and still picking them up, it is a bit annoying. Mommy and toddler love it. Just arrived and the first thing that hit me up was one of the building set was broken. It could be factory fault so I am rating this a five stars regardless. customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun! My 4yo son loves making 3D sandcastles with the molds.
customer_reviews.author: Shan K

product_meta.title: AnanBros Play Sand, Magic Space Sand Castle Building Kit, Squeezable Beach Sand 2 LB + Castle Molds and Sand Tray, Best Sand Toys for Kids
product_meta.description:
NEW GENERATION OF SAND TOYS
Everybody loves playing with sand - especially children! Space Sand allows for limitless creativity, and for fun mental exercise with no boundaries. However, due to various limitations, we can't just go to the beach to play in the sand with our friends any time. But with Space Sand, you don't need the beach, you can play with Space Sand anytime and anywhere, and enjoy an even more enjoyable playing experience! 

 ALL THE FUN OF REGULAR SAND, AND MORE! 
The Space Sand castle-themed play set includes a variety of molds and tools, a multi-use sandbox, and super-fun Space Sand. 
√ Inflatable sandbox - Includes a high-speed air pump, allowing you to inflate the sandbox in just 60 seconds, by folding the sandbox, you can also store the entire container in just 3 seconds, and carry it on the go. 
√ High quality molds - Thicker than cheap alternative molds, finely polished, making it easier to shape the sand without it sticking to the mold interior. 
√ Multi-tool - For even the most detailed and advanced sculpting. 
√ Space Sand - Stays wet at room temperature, doesn't stick to hands, so that you can play without getting your hands dirty. Extremely absorbent, sticking together easily so that no loose grains of sand will fall on the floor and make a mess. 

Other Instructions
1. For storage, it is recommended that you keep Space Sand in a sealed zip-lock bag.
2. It is recommended that Space Sand be used under adult supervision. The primary ingredient in Space Sand is real sand, do not ingest 

Package includes 
2LB Space Sand (plain colored)
1 x inflatable sandbox (24inch x 17.8inch) 
1 x high-speed air pump
10 x (regular) castle molds
4 x large castle molds
4 x vehicle molds
5 x tool knives
1 x Space Sand storage bag
1 x after-sale service card
Beautifully packaged (great as a gift)
feature_bullets: MORE FUN THAN REGULAR SAND - Space Sand is even more fun to play with than sand at the beach! You can enjoy the fun of Space Sand anywhere, whether it be in your bedroom, yard, car, or at school.
ABOUT SPACE SAND - Unlike regular sand, Space Sand stays wet without requiring added water, the sand holds easily due to its absorption strength, and is easy to arrange and mold.
KEEP YOUR HANDS DRY AND CLEAN - Space Sand won't make your hands dirty or slimy, and when you're finished your hands will be so clean it will be as though you didn't touch sand at all.
GUARANTEED SAFE AND NON-TOXIC - Odor-free and ASTM & CE certified, kid-friendly and parent approved.

SPACE SAND CASTLE THEME - 2LB Space Sand, 1 x inflatable sandbox, 1 x high-speed air pump, 10 x (regular) castle molds, 4 x large castle molds, 4 x vehicle molds, 5 x tool knives, 1 x Space Sand storage bag, 1 x after-sale service card, beautifully packaged (great as a gift), 30-day worry-free money back guarantee.
